revised_title: Strategies for Countering Insecticide Resistance in Pest Control
tldr: This article discusses the challenges and strategies for countering insecticide resistance in pest control. It highlights the importance of understanding resistance at the individual insect and population levels, as well as the need for multidisciplinary research to develop effective resistance-countering strategies. The author also emphasizes the role of biochemical techniques in monitoring and detecting resistance mechanisms in single insects, and the potential of mathematical models for simulating control strategies.
